report.title: The Expanding Room
report.author: MeltedMind
report.bodytext: I bought this legal herbal incense called kush. I smoked a little of it and it was fun. But I wondered what would it would be like to smoke about 7 or 8 bowls of it. And I felt like I was in wonderland. The ceiling was like two feet from the ground. The room was expanding. And I was pretty disconnected for a while. But pretty intense trip. Wild.
